query:
SELECT 
                a.receiver      AS buyer, 
                COUNT(*)        AS bought, 
                SUM(a.price)    AS volume
            FROM activities a
            WHERE a.tx_type = 'buy'
                AND a.collection_id = $1
                AND ($2::INTERVAL IS NULL OR a.block_time >= NOW() - $2::INTERVAL)
            GROUP BY a.receiver
            ORDER BY bought DESC, volume DESC
            LIMIT 10
